title: Rio Bananal Futebol Clube
text:
Rio Bananal Futebol Clube, commonly known as Rio Bananal, is a Brazilian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="Rio%20Bananal">Rio Bananal</a>, <a href="Esp%C3%ADrito%20Santo">Espírito Santo state</a>.
History.
The club was founded on January 17, 2007. They finished in the second position in the <a href="Campeonato%20Capixaba%20%28lower%20levels%29">Campeonato Capixaba Second Level</a> in 2008, losing the competition to <a href="Sociedade%20Desportiva%20Serra%20Futebol%20Clube">Serra</a>.
Stadium.
Rio Bananal Futebol Clube play their home games at <a href="Est%C3%A1dio%20Virg%C3%ADlio%20Grassi">Estádio Virgílio Grassi</a>. The stadium has a maximum capacity of 4,000 people.
